description: This file defines Express.js route handlers for product-related HTTP endpoints in an e-commerce backend, including list, get, create, update, and delete operations with corresponding Swagger API documentation.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles listing products with optional search, filtering, and pagination.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles retrieving a single product by its ID.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles creating a new product; requires authentication.

methods.name: update
methods.description: Handles updating an existing product by ID; requires authentication.

methods.name: remove
methods.description: Handles deleting a product by ID; requires authentication.
